flawed_nl_solution:
At the end of 2018, the tree will grow 100 x 10/100 = <<100*10/100=10>>10 meters more.
Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 10 = <<100+10=101>>101 meters.
At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 101 x 10/100 = <<101*10/100=101/10>>101/10 meters more.
So, its height at the end of 2019 is 101 + 101/10 = <<101+101/10=1111/10>>1111/10 meters.
Therefore, the tree has grown 1111/10 - 100 = <<1111/10-100=111/10>>111/10 meters.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 101. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
